name: Frankie Crashed on Jupiter
overview: Frankie Crashed on Jupiter is an English-language, somewhat bizarre text / graphic adventure . As the name of the game suggests, a certain spaceship called Frankie (according to the cover picture) builds a crash landing on Jupiter. If it were not Jupiter, you could still call that "normal," but Jupiter is a gas giant. But what you then have to gather together in the spaceship and build in order to get a codeword falls under "slightly off the hook". Curious? Just play through, then you know it too ...
